publication.title: Mobile technologies for the world's children
publication.authors: allison druin,david cavallo,christopher fabian,benjamin b. bederson,glenda revelle,yvonne rogers
publication.keyword: Educational Application;Mobile Application;Mobile Device;Mobile Phone;Mobile Technology;Profitability;Third World;
publication.abstract: In this panel, academic, non-profit, and industry professionals will discuss their global perspectives on mobile technologies for the world's children. Panelists will explore such issues concerning children's access to mobile devices, the decreasing age that children have access to these technologies, mobile innovations for learning, and challenges/opportunities in diverse countries.
